text: "Willie," the judge said huskily, "that was as pretty a piece of seamanship as I ever '3Naw, disputed willie. 3'Just play in damn fine luck this time. He plenty smart though. As they reached the pier, the judge on legs that were a little unsteady, they found Bueno Buck, now on the pier, leading the yawl toward the wave-battered shore.
